item.title: Introduction to R (University of Zambia)
item.description: Before the workshop begins, make you have downloaded and installed R on your machine. I have written a document containing instructions about downloading and installing R. Find it here if you need it. It also has basic R commands. The workshop schedule is here The folder containing lab handouts and datasets should be downloaded from here
